info.title: Microsoft.SecurityDevOps
info.description: REST APIs for Defender for DevOps

get.summary: Returns a monitored AzureDevOps Connector resource for a given ID.

put.summary: Creates or updates an Azure DevOps Connector.

get.summary: Returns a monitored AzureDevOps Org resource for a given ID.

put.summary: Creates or updates an Azure DevOps Org.

get.summary: Returns a monitored AzureDevOps Project resource for a given ID.

put.summary: Creates or updates an Azure DevOps Project.

get.summary: Returns a monitored AzureDevOps Project resource for a given ID.

put.summary: Creates or updates an Azure DevOps Project.

get.summary: Returns a monitored GitHub Connector resource for a given ID.

put.summary: Create or update a monitored GitHub Connector resource.

get.summary: Returns a list of monitored GitHub repositories.

put.summary: Create or update a monitored GitHub repository.

get.summary: Returns a list of monitored GitHub Connectors.
Returns a list of monitored AzureDevOps Connectors.

get.description: Returns list of operations supported by the Microsoft.SecurityDevOps provider.

code.description: Gets or sets one-time OAuth code to exchange for refresh and access tokens.

value.description: Gets or sets list of resources.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets next link to scroll over the results.

AzureDevOpsConnectorProperties.description: Properties of the ARM resource for /subscriptions/xxx/resourceGroups/xxx/providers/Microsoft.SecurityDevOps/azDevOpsConnectors.

orgs.description: Gets or sets org onboarding information.

value.description: Gets or sets list of resources.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets next link to scroll over the results.

name.description: Gets or sets name of the AzureDevOps Org.

enableAutoDiscovery.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether auto discovery is on.

orgId.description: Gets or sets gitHub repo account id.

enableAutoDiscovery.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether auto discovery is on.

value.description: Gets or sets list of resources.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets next link to scroll over the results.

name.description: Gets or sets name of the AzureDevOps Project.

enableAutoDiscovery.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether auto discovery is on.

projectId.description: Gets or sets gitHub repo account id.

enableAutoDiscovery.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether auto discovery is on.

value.description: Gets or sets list of resources.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets next link to scroll over the results.

repoId.description: Gets or sets gitHub repo account id.

repoUrl.description: Gets or sets gitHub repo url.

value.description: Gets or sets list of resources.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets next link to scroll over the results.

GitHubConnectorProperties.description: Properties of the ARM resource for /subscriptions/xxx/resourceGroups/xxx/providers/Microsoft.SecurityDevOps/gitHubConnectors.

code.description: Gets or sets one-time OAuth code to exchange for refresh and access tokens.

value.description: Gets or sets list of resources.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets next link to scroll over the results.

accountId.description: Gets or sets gitHub repo account id.

repoName.description: Gets or sets gitHub repo name.

repoUrl.description: Gets or sets gitHub repo url.

GitHubOwnerName.name: gitHubOwnerName
GitHubOwnerName.description: Name of the GitHub Repo Owner.
